item.title: Hobnail boots, Multicoloured Mirrors
item.description: Prompt 1 The man in the crowd with the multicoloured mirrors on his hobnail boots. Digital Art

item.title: Sky is Blue; Blows my Mind
item.description: Prompt 1 The world is round. The wind is high. The sky is blue. It blows my mind. It makes me cry. Digital art

item.title: Across the Universe
item.description: Links Blog article https://mullikine.github.io/posts/across-the-universe/ Prompts 1 a couple kissing within a strawberry in space. stars in the background. Across the universe. Digital Art 1 a couple within a strawberry in space. stars in the background. Across the universe. Digital Art 1 a couple kissing within a strawberry in space. stars in the background. Across the universe. Digital Art 1 a couple embracing within a splat of paint in the shape of a strawberry in space.

item.title: Cat Playing Checkers
item.description: Prompt 1 a surrealist dream-like oil painting by Salvador Dalí of a cat playing checkers

item.title: Corrupted Multiverse
item.description: Hmm sounds OK Heracleitus called the Universal Principle (των απαντων αρχη) Intellectual Fire (πυρ νοερον), and said that the sphere surrounding us and reaching to the Moon was filled with evil, but beyond the Moon-sphere it was purer. http://gnosis.org/library/grs-mead/grsm%5Fsimon%5Fmagus.htm#FNanchor%5F97 Perhaps this is to say that most of Creation isn’t corrupted. But around Earth, it kinda is. Perhaps the corruption hasn’t spread far from Earth. DALL-E Scriptures 1 Corinthians 15:33 33 Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.

item.title: Fiery Red Girl
item.description: Links Describing Melee’s Paintings with AlephAlpha // Bodacious Blog Imagining Melee’s artworks with DALL-E-2 // Bodacious Blog <3 I use DALLE to imagine my descriptions of Melee’s paintings. There is a prompt limit, so the descriptions could be improved using Imagism. However, I’m using the opening paragraph of each original description. These generations are cool but so far nowhere accurate enough to capture the nuance of Melee’s original artworks. Fiery red girl 1 2 3 4 5 A girl believes she must prepare for her photo to be taken.

item.title: How to Draw a Picture
item.description: Blog article https://mullikine.github.io/posts/how-to-draw-a-picture/ 1 2 3 4 To begin, select a suitable piece of paper for use, and apply pencil to same. Then, select a pencil sharpener and sharpen pencil to a suitable degree...

item.title: Indian in the Cupboard
item.description: Prompt 1 2 A magical cupboard. When plastic toys are locked in the cupboard, they become real, living beings.

item.title: Mad Tea-Party
item.description: Prompts 1 2 3 There was a table set out under a tree in front of the house, and the March Hare and the Hatter were having tea at it. Digital Art 1 2 3 4 Have some wine, _ the March Hare said in an encouraging tone. Alice looked all round the table, but there was nothing on it but tea. Digital Art 1 2 3 There was a table set out under a tree in front of the house, and the March Hare and the Hatter were having tea at it.
